Package ta4_1.MoneyFlow_Backend.Expenses

Class ExpensesController

java.lang.Object
ta4_1.MoneyFlow_Backend.Expenses.ExpensesController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/expenses") public class ExpensesController extends Object
Controller for managing expenses.

    • createExpenses

      @PostMapping("/{userId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> createExpenses(@PathVariable UUID userId, @RequestBody Expenses expenses)
      Create or update expenses for a user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user.
      expenses - The expenses object to be created or updated.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the created or updated expenses.

    • getExpensesOfUser

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Expenses> getExpensesOfUser(@PathVariable UUID id)
      Get an expense of a user.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the found expenses.

    • getAllExpenses

      @GetMapping public List<Expenses> getAllExpenses()

      Returns:
      List of all expenses.

    • addExpensesToUser

      @PutMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Expenses> addExpensesToUser(@PathVariable UUID id, @RequestBody Expenses updatedExpenses)
      Update expenses by user ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user whose expenses to update.
      updatedExpenses - The updated expenses object.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the updated expenses.

    • deleteExpensesByUserId

      @DeleteMapping("/{userId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> deleteExpensesByUserId(@PathVariable UUID userId)
      Delete expenses by user ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user whose expenses are to be deleted.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity indicating the result of the deletion.
